bibl.title: Despatch from Ezekiel E. Smith to Alvey A. Adee, November 11, 1889
Despatches from United States Consuls in Monrovia, 1852-1906

correspAction.roleName: U.S. Minister Resident and Consular General

div1.p: Consulate General of the United States, Monrovia, Liberia, November 11th, 1889
Mr. Ezekiel E. Smith To the Deartment of State.
Consulate General of the United States, Monrovia, Liberia, November 11th, 1889
Honorable Alvey A. Adee, Acting Secretary,
Sir: I have the honor respectfully to acknowledge the receipt of Department Circulars, dated September 10th, 21st, and 27th, 1889, respectively.
The contents of each has been carefully noted and shall be complied with at the earliest date possible.
I am, sir, your obedient servant,
Ezekiel E. Smith U.S. Consul General
